column4: What is it about webmin that makes it incompatible with Ubuntu? Why does Ubuntu say the package is of bad quality, yet the rest of the Linux world uses it without issue?
Question - how can I see the current status of my raid array, as in which drives are active, degraded, whether they are syncing, etc?
As the bot says, webmin doesn't deal well with Debian-style configuration files.
I see. I was just trying to understand how it didn't play nice. If I were a webmin dev I'd try to make it universal. *shrug*
